summary: The legend of secret pass is a charming CGI animated movie inspired by American Indian mythology,
cast: Zoe Axelrod|Shelley Berman|Michael Chiklis|David Cross|Debi Derryberry|Graham Greene|Kim Mai Guest|Cheryl Hines|Billy Jones|Gael MacGregor|Frankie Muniz|Joe Pantoliano|Ron Perlman|Christy Carlson Romano|Ramona Wright|Rob Pinkston
title: The Legend of Secret Pass
